module.actions: <action name="disp<%= module_name.substring(0,1).toLocaleUpperCase() + module_name.substring(1) %>AdminConfig" type="view" admin_index="true" menu_name="menu_<%= module_name %>" menu_index="true" /> <action name="disp<%= module_name.substring(0,1).toLocaleUpperCase() + module_name.substring(1) %>AdminTabEx" type="view" /> <action name="proc<%= module_name.substring(0,1).toLocaleUpperCase() + module_name.substring(1) %>AdminInsertConfig" type="controller" />
